GET /api.description: serves up a json representation of all the available endpoints of the api

GET /api/topics.description: serves an array of all topic objects

GET /api/articles.description: serves an array of all topics

GET /api/articles/:article_id.description: serves a specific article object by article id

GET /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: serves an array of comments for a given article id

POST /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: accepts a request body to post a new comment on a specified article and returns the newly posted comment

DELETE /api/comments/:comment_id.description: deletes a specified comment by comment id from the database and returns no content

PATCH /api/articles/:article_id.description: patches an existing article to increment or decrement the votes property by the specified amount, then serves the updated article
